titles: The history of the civil wars of England from the year 1640-1660 / by T.H.
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
notes: "Most editions have title: Behemoth, etc. Finished in 1668, work suppressed until surreptitiously published in 1679"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660.
